title: What does the feedback consist of?
details: The feedback consists of the feelings collected from temporary employees and the feedback they give. Feedback can be anonymous or named.

title: Can I respond to feedback?
details: Feedback sent by name can be replied to. However, it is not possible to respond to anonymous feedback.

title: Do the temporary workers have the same responsibilities as the personnel service company?
details: No. The temporary worker has his own responsibilities that apply to him.
